Much depended on Rost6v's win- ning or losing on that seven of hearts. On the previous Sunday the old count had given his son two thousand rubles, and though he al- ways disliked speaking of money difficulties had told Nicholas that this was all he could let 
him have till May, and asked him to be more economical this
